etymology.description: 中山 + 区 = district named after Sun Yat-sen
etymology.interpretation: Administrative district of Taipei named in honor of Sun Yat-sen (aka Sun Zhongshan). 中山 here is his honorific name used in many place names across the Sinophone world.
etymology.simplification: 區 → 区 was simplified in Mainland to reduce strokes; Taiwan keeps 區. 中山 is unchanged across scripts.

examples.chinese: 中山区位于台北市北部(中山區位於臺北市北部)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngshān Qū wèiyú Táiběi Shì běibù.
examples.english: Zhongshan District is located in the northern part of Taipei City.

examples.chinese: 中山区以林森北路夜生活闻名(中山區以林森北路夜生活聞名)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngshān Qū yǐ Línsēn Běilù yèshēnghuó wénmíng.
examples.english: Zhongshan District is famous for the nightlife on Linsen North Road.

examples.chinese: 从松山机场到中山区很近(從松山機場到中山區很近)。
examples.pinyin: Cóng Sōngshān Jīchǎng dào Zhōngshān Qū hěn jìn.
examples.english: It is very close from Songshan Airport to Zhongshan District.
